doc:
Michael O'Keefe https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Michael_O%27Keefe 0 Michael O'Keefe (born Raymond Peter O'Keefe, Jr.; April 24, 1955) is an American film and television actor, known for his roles as Danny Noonan in Caddyshack and Ben Meechum in The Great Santini — for which he received a nomination for the Academy Award for Best Supporting Actor. Michael_O'Keefe ( born Raymond_Peter_O'Keefe , Jr. ; April_24 , 1955 ) is an_American_film_and_television_actor , known for his_roles as Danny_Noonan in Caddyshack and Ben_Meechum in The_Great_Santini — for which he received a_nomination for the_Academy_Award for Best_Supporting_Actor .
